position: Building Blinkit | Ex -Amazon, Ex- AON, Ex- Airtel

experience.title: Senior Business Developer
experience.description: Generate new business opportunities from a targeted list of potential organization partners. Research accounts, identify key players, generate interest and develop accounts to drive opportunity. Respond to inbound interest and qualify fit for the organization platform through discovery calls. Stay up-to-date on industry trends and competition.Work with Product and Marketing teams to convey feedback on prospect requirements and drive product strategy. Manage, track, and report on all activities and results using CRM tools.  Determine customer service operational strategy by conducting need assessment, performance review, capacity planning and cost benefit analysis.Responsible to establish and refine delivery process to ensure order fulfilment. Maintain and improve delivery operation by monitoring system performance, identifying and resolving customer service issues. Creation of credit/debit notes for customers/clients

experience.title: Retail Manager
experience.description: Deliver excellent service to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction. Motivate the sales team to meet sales objectives by training and mentoring staff. Create business strategies to attract new customers, expand store traffic, and enhance profitability.Undertake store administration duties such as managing store budgets and updating financial records. Build and maintain C-Level relationships in the named Enterprise AccountsMonitor inventory levels and order new items. Nurture the prospective clients on industry trends and innovative solutions for the key challenges across the system.Ensured required MIS & tracking at CRO levels

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Managed the recruitment of students for Overseas Education for countries like Lithuania, Poland & New Zealand. Execute sales strategy for the assigned market region and thereby increase the revenue generation and market share Ensuring that effective designs are generated and presented to clients. Achieving the set targets by strategizing planning and motivating the entire team. Liaising with external agencies to efficiently operate the profit centreResponsible for the sales numbers from the International Markets. Align with internal teams (Inside Sales, Marketing and Product) to deliver the numbers. Manage the end-to-end sales process and provide clear visibility on the pipeline to the leadership team

experience.title: Virtual Recruiting Specialist - Team Member
experience.description: Positively represent candidate to client. Solving complex procedure of Hiring for Management and Non-Management Positions by screening the applicants and then initiating the background checks and Drug Test. Generate offer letters accurate in every detail, obtain approvals as needed, and provide to   candidates. Active participant in training and calibration sessions. Initiated an active role in the mastery of learned programs by reviewing guidelines, listening to calls and solicitingRepresenting AON India in client meetings/calls and provide expert recommendations from a logistical perspective where appropriate; if needed, assist in the development of new programs in the form of role/candidate material review, demo calls and identifies program modifications.
